WRITING.TITLE: How large will ur boner be if Vega RX launches less than 1080 and beats it?

WRITING.TEXT:
If it's like any previous tech launch and it's launching in june. Then it's allready done at this point. It would just be code managment and optimization tweaks at software levels.
It takes i think someone posted 1 week to creat one unit sized batch for average factory process on a 14nm node. So you place an order for 10,000 GTX 1080s and it will take 1 week to make then ship and store so ur looking at close to 3 weeks for delivery of the chips just to get them to the AIB partners.
So it's probably safe to assume people like asus and all that have the chipsets now to have enough stock come june.
My old company used to get custom made Process units made on a 22nm system and it would take anywhere from 1 month to 1 and half months and that's when we bought in huge allotments of over 12,000 or more at a time
